images.prompt: A fractured celestial being of intricate gears and ruby luminescence spills from a distorted reality, caught within a beam of stark illumination against an infinite, consuming darkness, its form revealed through a reversed and prismatic lens as delicate, crimson flakes drift like silent snowfall around its decaying, mechanical wings—a haunting portrait rendered with the aesthetic of glitching VHS tapes and early 3D rendering, prioritizing textured surfaces and imperfect geometry to evoke a feeling of fragile beauty and technological obsolescence, achieving photorealistic detail in the component parts while maintaining a purposefully lo-fi, dreamlike quality reminiscent of late 90s CGI; the lighting aims for dramatic chiaroscuro, highlighting the polished metal and internal workings while letting the surrounding void swallow details, a digital painting showcasing a highly detailed, complex composition focused on the intersection of divine and artificial, presented as a stunning, high-resolution artwork with a focus on intricate surface textures and subtle chromatic aberration—imagine a realistic depiction of an angel constructed from clockwork, viewed through a warped, kaleidoscopic perspective, pushing the boundaries of digital art and realism, leaning into the uncanny valley with purpose.

Within a shimmering, iridescent sphere – as if glimpsed through a fractured lens of captured time – a figure draped in tattered, peach-toned fabrics pulses with the ethereal glow of a celestial aurora, her form subtly avian and ancient, dissolving into streams of oxide and rose-gold paint that mimic the flow of galaxies, suggesting a being both bound by and born of fleeting moments, rendered with hyperrealistic detail akin to a digital painting pushing the boundaries of CGI and fluid art, showcasing intricate feather-like textures woven into the dissolving cloth, and a hauntingly beautiful expression illuminated by the internal luminescence, evoking a sense of sorrowful grace and timeless wisdom, a portrait infused with the energy of creation itself, displayed as a meticulously crafted digital artwork with global illumination and subsurface scattering to enhance the organic feel, leaning into a photorealistic style while retaining the fantastical essence of the subject, complete with minute details like light reflecting off moisture on the subject's skin and the delicate fraying of the torn material, evoking a sense of melancholy and captivating otherworldliness.
